title: Create API endpoint to create issues
description: Build a backend endpoint that calls 'bd create' with the provided issue details. Return the created issue ID for adding to the graph.

title: Implement git commit on changes
description: After any issue or dependency change, automatically run 'bd sync' to commit the changes to git. Provide feedback to the user about the commit.

title: Enable edge creation by connecting nodes
description: Configure React Flow to allow users to draw edges between nodes by dragging from one node's handle to another. This represents creating a dependency relationship.

title: Set up React Router v7
description: Install and configure react-router v7 for navigation. Set up basic routes for the main DAG view and any detail views needed.

title: Create React Flow canvas component
description: Build the main canvas component using React Flow. Set up the FlowProvider, configure pan/zoom controls, and create the basic layout structure.

title: Create API endpoint to add dependencies
description: Build a backend endpoint that calls 'bd dep add <blocked> <blocker>' when a user connects two nodes. Handle validation to prevent cycles.

title: Add React Flow library and configure
description: Install React Flow (@xyflow/react) and set up basic configuration. Create a wrapper component that will house the DAG visualization.

title: Implement DAG layout algorithm
description: Implement automatic positioning of nodes in a DAG layout (layered/hierarchical). Issues with no dependencies go at the top/left, and dependent issues are positioned below/right. Consider using dagre or elkjs.

title: Transform dependencies to React Flow edges
description: Create a data transformer that converts beads dependency relationships into React Flow edge format. Each dependency becomes a directed edge from blocker to blocked issue.

title: Create API endpoint to get dependency graph
description: Build a backend endpoint that calls 'bd graph --all --json' or 'bd dep list' to get the dependency relationships between issues. This will be the data source for edges in the graph.

title: Implement git push to remote
description: Add ability to push committed changes to the GitHub remote. Can be automatic after each commit or triggered by a button. Show push status to user.

title: Create custom node component for issues
description: Build a custom React Flow node component that displays issue details: title, status (with color coding), type, and priority. Make it visually clear and clickable.

title: Transform issues to React Flow nodes
description: Create a data transformer that converts beads issue data into React Flow node format. Map issue ID to node ID, position nodes, and include issue metadata.

title: Add issue creation UI
description: Create a UI for adding new issues - could be a floating action button that opens a modal/drawer. Include fields for title, description, type, and priority.

title: Create API endpoint to list issues
description: Build a backend endpoint that calls 'bd list --json' and returns all issues in JSON format. This will be the data source for nodes in the graph.

title: Initialize Vite React TypeScript project
description: Set up a new Vite project with React and TypeScript. Configure the project structure with src/ directory for components and services. This is the foundation for the web app.
